site_description: A small site devoted to Gokou Ruri.
site_keywords: Gokou Ruri, Ruri, Kuroneko, Shironeko, Kamineko, Yamineko, Oreimo, Ore no Imouto, Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai, 瑠璃, 五更 瑠璃, 黒猫
about_media:
I wanted to showcase various media of the character Gokou Ruri (Kuroneko) while doing something a bit different than the standard image blog.
Sadly kuroneko.moe is taken for at least another year, so ruri.moe it is.
about_thanks: Tsukasa Fushimi for creating such a <3 character, and Hiro Kanzaki for <3 character designs.
about_copyright: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai is a property of Tsukasa Fushimi and ASCII Media Works.
